FontString.name: $parentGroupText
FontString.text: A group has been formed for:

Scripts.OnClick: if roleCheckTank:IsEnabled() == 1 then if roleCheckTank:GetChecked() == 1 then roleCheckTank:SetChecked(false) LFTsetRole('', true, true) else roleCheckTank:SetChecked(true) LFTsetRole('tank', true, true) end end

if roleCheckHealer:IsEnabled() == 1 then if roleCheckHealer:GetChecked() == 1 then roleCheckHealer:SetChecked(false) LFTsetRole('', true, true) else roleCheckHealer:SetChecked(true) LFTsetRole('healer', true, true) end end

if roleCheckDamage:IsEnabled() == 1 then if roleCheckDamage:GetChecked() == 1 then roleCheckDamage:SetChecked(false) LFTsetRole('', true, true) else roleCheckDamage:SetChecked(true) LFTsetRole('damage', true, true) end end

FontString.name: LFTLowLevel
FontString.text: Reach level 13 to use this feature.

Scripts.OnClick: if RoleTank:IsEnabled() == 1 then RoleTank:SetChecked(not RoleTank:GetChecked()) LFTsetRole('tank', RoleTank:GetChecked()) end
if RoleHealer:IsEnabled() == 1 then RoleHealer:SetChecked(not RoleHealer:GetChecked()) LFTsetRole('healer', RoleHealer:GetChecked()) end
if RoleDamage:IsEnabled() == 1 then RoleDamage:SetChecked(not RoleDamage:GetChecked()) LFTsetRole('damage', RoleDamage:GetChecked()) end

FontString.name: $parentNoPeople
FontString.text: No players are looking for groups at the moment.
